detail_desc: Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Thermal longjohns in marled functional fabric with an elasticated waist and flatlock seams.
Long-sleeved shirt in washed cotton denim with a print motif front and back. Corduroy-lined collar, press-studs down the front and at the cuffs, and flap chest pockets with a press-stud.
Socks in a soft rib knit with elasticated, frill-trimmed tops.
Socks in a soft rib knit with elasticated, frill-trimmed tops.
Socks in a soft rib knit with elasticated, frill-trimmed tops.
Jacket in soft velour with a sparkly stone appliqué and print motif at the top. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and drawstring hood with a ribbed trim. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and drawstring hood with a ribbed trim. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in soft pile with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in soft pile with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Pyjamas in soft jersey. Top with a wrapover front, short sleeves and gathers at the side for best fit over the tummy. Bottoms with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. Can be worn both during pregnancy and while nursing afterwards. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.

Pyjamas in soft jersey. Top with a wrapover front, short sleeves and gathers at the side for best fit over the tummy. Bottoms with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. Can be worn both during pregnancy and while nursing afterwards. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.
V-neck body in soft lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, press-studs at the crotch and a high cut at the back. Jersey lining over the bust.
V-neck body in soft lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, press-studs at the crotch and a high cut at the back. Jersey lining over the bust.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves, each with a decorative flap and concealed press-stud. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves, each with a decorative flap and concealed press-stud. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
TOCA LIFE x H&M. Padded gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.

Wide, calf-length dress in airy chiffon with a small stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front and long, wide sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist and a skirt with an asymmetric hem. Short jersey inner dress with narrow shoulder straps. The chiffon content of the dress is made from recycled polyester.

Straight-cut jacket in imitation leather with a collar, press-studs down the front, and a yoke. Dropped shoulders, cuffs with press-studs, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and concealed front pockets.
Coat in a stretch, checked weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and buttons down the front. Welt front pockets, two inner pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Fitted, calf-length dress in sturdy jersey crêpe. Narrow shoulder straps with decorative metal details, and a short slit at the back. Lined.
Jeans in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jeans in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves, decorative metal buttons on the shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves, decorative metal buttons on the shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves, decorative metal buttons on the shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves, decorative metal buttons on the shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves, decorative metal buttons on the shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket shorts in soft, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud.
5-pocket shorts in soft, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with beaded embroidery around the neckline, 3/4-length puff sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs and a wide, ribbed trim at the hem.
KELZUKI x H&M. Set with a hat and tube scarf in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Fleece lining.
Long-sleeved, knitted dress with a round neckline, buttons at the back of the neck and flounces down the front. Seam at the hips and a gently flared skirt.

Dungaree shorts in an airy, cotton weave with a heart-shaped chest pocket and flounce-trimmed straps with adjustable press-stud fastenings at the front. Back pockets and legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Dungaree shorts in an airy, cotton weave with a heart-shaped chest pocket and flounce-trimmed straps with adjustable press-stud fastenings at the front. Back pockets and legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Baby Exclusive Dungarees in soft, fine-knit organic cotton. Flounce-trimmed straps with an adjustable fastening at the back, and ribbed hems.

Long dress in a crêpe weave with a mesh and lace bodice, opening with a button at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the back. Short, wide sleeves in lace, a seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Partly lined.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Seam at the waist, narrow, covered elastication at the back and a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Seam at the waist, narrow, covered elastication at the back and a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Seam at the waist, narrow, covered elastication at the back and a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.
Leather ankle boots with pointed toes, a zip in one side and leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.

Body in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with press-studs and a high cut at the back.
Knee-length cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband containing a concealed key pocket.
Knee-length cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband containing a concealed key pocket.
Knee-length cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband containing a concealed key pocket.

Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups to lift and shape the bust and a small opening at the front with support panels and narrow satin ribbon ties. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide, elasticated lace trim at the hem and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups to lift and shape the bust and a small opening at the front with support panels and narrow satin ribbon ties. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide, elasticated lace trim at the hem and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups to lift and shape the bust and a small opening at the front with support panels and narrow satin ribbon ties. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide, elasticated lace trim at the hem and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sock boots in imitation suede with a soft elasticated shaft and covered heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Sock boots in imitation suede with a soft elasticated shaft and covered heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Sock boots in imitation suede with a soft elasticated shaft and covered heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Thong briefs in lace with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and string back.
Ankle boots with pointed toes, covered heels and a zip in one side. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Ankle boots with pointed toes, covered heels and a zip in one side. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.

Soft, non-wired bralette in lace with mesh-lined, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, two rows of elastic and a lace trim at the hem, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Soft, non-wired bralette in lace with mesh-lined, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, two rows of elastic and a lace trim at the hem, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Metal hoop earrings with small, rhomboid-shaped pendants at the bottom. Diameter approx. 4 cm.
Cold shoulder blouse in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated, frilled trim at the shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.

Metal hoop earrings with leaf-shaped pendants. Length 6 cm.
5-pocket jeans in soft, stretch denim with worn details. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
5-pocket jeans in soft, stretch denim with worn details. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.

Body in mesh and lace with a super push-up bra. Underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs and a high cut at the back.
Small hairbrush that folds into a compact with a mirror. Diameter 7 cm.

Adjustable, shimmering on-ear headphones with a padded headband. Integral volume limiter set at 85 dB to protect your child’s hearing. Suitable for mobile phones with a 3.5 mm socket. Length of wire approx. 120 cm. Not suitable for children under the age of 3.

Open jacket in airy, crinkled viscose with low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves.

Short, sleeveless dress in stretch cotton corduroy with a V-neck, seam at the waist and a detachable belt with a plastic buckle. Concealed zip in one side.
Fitted dress in airy mesh with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves. Jersey inner dress with narrow shoulder straps.

Calf-length dress in airy cotton poplin with a collar, V-neck, buttons down the front and cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Detachable tie belt at the waist, a flared skirt with pleats for added width, concealed pockets in the side seams and a slit at the back. Unlined.
